I have implemented [Lucene search](http://https://github.com/Kentico/xperience-by-kentico-lucene "Lucene search") for Articles using this [community.kentico.com project](http://https://github.com/Kentico/community-portal "community.kentico.com project") as well as the [Lucene Github](http:/https://github.com/Kentico/xperience-by-kentico-lucene/ "Lucene Github") documentation as references to create the required LuceneIndexingStrategy, which is working correctly.
Are there any examples anywhere of how to build a full-site-search IndexingStrategy instead of indivual ones for each content type? Is it simply a matter of combining all the code for each content type into a single IndexingStrategy? Any guidance through this process would be most helpful.
---
**Environment** - Xperience by Kentico version: 29.3.0 - .NET version: [8] - Deployment environment: Localhost - Link to relevant [Xperience by Kentico documentation](https://docs.kentico.com)
